DebugHeader Struct Reference

#include <new_delete.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

DebugHeader * prev
DebugHeader * next
size_t size
unsigned block_num
int is_array

Detailed Description

this structure added to each block, if defined OP_NEW_DEBUG. You can retrieve it by OpNewGetHeader function. Also you can add your own members.
See also:
OpNewGetHeader

Member Data Documentation

unsigned DebugHeader::block_num
 

number of allocation

int DebugHeader::is_array
 

was allocated by new[] or new?

DebugHeader * DebugHeader::next
 

pointer to headers of next and previos blocks.

DebugHeader* DebugHeader::prev
 

pointer to headers of next and previos blocks.

size_t DebugHeader::size
 

size of requested block size. Do NOT include size of guards and header
